title: Add Boostly iOS PWA splash screens (assets, index.html wiring, SW precache)

requirements.summary: Add Boostly PWA splash screen image set as static generated assets matching current icon style and required filenames/dimensions.
acceptanceCriteria: All specified splash screen image files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames and dimensions listed in imageRequirements.required.
Each splash image is purely visual, centered, and remains readable/correctly composed when cropped slightly by device safe areas (no important elements near edges).

requirements.summary: Wire up iOS PWA splash screen support by adding apple-touch-startup-image link tags with correct media queries.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes apple-touch-startup-image link tags that reference the new /assets/generated/boostly-splash.*.png files.
The link tags include media attributes matching the image dimensions/orientation so iOS Safari can select the correct splash image.
No existing icon links, manifest link, or social metadata are removed.

file_operations.description: Add <link rel="apple-touch-startup-image"> tags referencing the following assets: /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1170x2532.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1290x2796.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1125x2436.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1242x2688.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1536x2048.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1668x2388.png. Use iOS Safari-compatible media queries that match each image’s device-width/device-height, -webkit-device-pixel-ratio, and portrait orientation; keep all existing icons/manifest/social metadata intact.

requirements.summary: Precache the new splash images in the service worker so they are available offline.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/sw.js PRECACHE_ASSETS includes the new splash image paths so they are cached during service worker install.
Existing offline behavior continues to work (offline.html remains the navigation fallback).

file_operations.description: Extend PRECACHE_ASSETS to include: /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1170x2532.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1290x2796.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1125x2436.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1242x2688.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1536x2048.png, /assets/generated/boostly-splash.dim_1668x2388.png, ensuring offline.html remains the navigation fallback and existing cached assets remain unchanged.
